      • copyRecursively

        Recursively copies all files under fromPath to toPath.

      • copyRecursively

        public static void copyRecursively(java.nio.file.Path fromPath,
                   java.nio.file.Path toPath,
                   Function<java.nio.file.Path,java.nio.file.Path> transform)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Recursively copies all files under fromPath to toPath. The transform will be applied after the destination path for a file has been relativized.
        Parameters:
        fromPath - item to copy
        toPath - destination of copy
        transform - renaming function to apply when copying. If this function returns null, then the file is not copied.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sortFilesByAccessTime

        public static void sortFilesByAccessTime(java.io.File[] files)
        Does an in-place sort of the specified files array. Most recently accessed files will be at the front of the array when sorted.

      • makeExecutable

        public static void makeExecutable(java.nio.file.Path file)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Tries to make the specified file executable. For file systems that do support the POSIX-style permissions, the executable permission is set for each category of users that already has the read permission. If the file system does not support the executable permission or the operation fails, a java.io.IOException is thrown.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sanitize

        public static java.lang.String sanitize(java.lang.String name)
        Given a file name, replace any illegal characters from it.
        Parameters:
        name - The file name to sanitize
        Returns:
        a properly sanitized filename

      • concatenateFiles

        public static boolean concatenateFiles(java.nio.file.Path dest,
                       java.lang.Iterable<java.nio.file.Path> pathsToConcatenate)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Concatenates the contents of one or more files.
        Parameters:
        dest - The path to which the concatenated files' contents are written.
        pathsToConcatenate - The paths whose contents are concatenated to dest.
        Returns:
        true if any data was concatenated to dest, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
